verbose_text: Together with our demonstration of a reciprocal link between hTERT expression and EMT in breast CSCs, the high expression of hTERT in invasive breast cancers raises the possibility that the more aggressive nature of hTERT-high cancers may be, in part, attributable to the ability of hTERT to activate a mesenchymal status, which in turn might contribute to tumor progression, metastasis and therapy resistance.
